ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for double-crust pie, 6 large Granny Smith apples, peeled and cored,   +   1/2 cup butter,   +   3/4 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 3 cups water, 2 cups white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 35g 45%, Saturated Fat 15g 74%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 434mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 148g 54%, Dietary Fiber 7g 23%, Total Sugars 115g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 11mg 53%, Calcium 52mg 4%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 319mg 7%
